TransactionStateContext.Withdraw State: Allows owner to withdraw tokens or Ether from the contract balance.
TransactionStateContext.External Interaction State: Transfers tokens from external token contracts to the owner, and potentially executes code in external contracts.

ExternalInteractions.withdrawTokens: Transfers tokens from a specified token contract to the contract owner.
ExternalInteractions.withdrawEther: Transfers Ether from the contract balance to the owner.
ExternalInteractions.getTokens: Executes arbitrary code on a specified address 'addr' without transferring value.
